CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT and CHI enter the room . INV explains warm-up to them and leaves the room . MOT is sitting on a chair against the wall and CHI is standing in front of her
<bef> MOT opens mouth looking into eyes of CHI in a playful expression of surprise . MOT smiles as she talks
<aft> MOT gets out of chair and kneels on floor
CHI holds knee of MOT and looks up at the door . <aft> CHI stares at door as he takes a few steps in direction that MOT moved
CHI turns his head to watch MOT
MOT pulls jack+in+the+box close to her . MOT pushes the head of jack+in+the+box
MOT picks up jack+in+the+box begins to turn crank at a very fast tempo
CHI turns to where the MOT holds jack+in+the+box and watches . CHI turns away looking at other toys on the floor
CHI picks up a small football
CHI picks up ball . CHI holds ball out in front of MOT
MOT pushes clown's head in the box
CHI turns the ball in one outstretched hand
CHI smiles and looks at the ball
MOT picks up a small rubber toy and puts in on the jack+in+the+box
CHI brings the ball close to him and fiddles with it finally fitting the tip of the ball in his mouth
CHI drops the ball . CHI squats down and reaches for the duck
MOT squeezes the duck three times to make it squeak and lets go of it
CHI takes the duck and tries to make it squeak
CHI stands and throws the duck hard towards MOT
<bef> MOT puts out her hands to catch the duck
CHI looks at other toys on the floor
MOT makes the rubber duck squeak while moving it towards CHI
CHI steps around and bends down to pick up a toy car from the floor
CHI brielfy looks at the duck in MOT's hand
CHI holds out the car on its side offering it to MOT
CHI stands in front of kneeling MOT
MOT looks at CHI wide eyed
MOT turns car right side up and holds it in the same place
<bef> CHI leaves car in MOT's hand . CHI takes three big steps to the side and bends over to get the rubber toy which he squeezes once
MOT puts the car on the floor and rolls it
<bef> MOT leans forward to pick up the car and puts it down close to CHI
CHI glances over at MOT and then looks down at the rubber toy again
<aft> MOT moves jack+in+the+box out of the way
CHI stands up with toy and pulls his arm back ready to throw it again
MOT puts up hands to block the toy
CHI throws the toy at MOT
the duck hits MOT's shoulder and bounces behind her
MOT leans around to grab the rubber toy
MOT looks at CHI shaking her head no and smiling
MOT puts the rubber toy on the desk top behind her
<1-2> MOT looks at car . <3> MOT looks at CHI
MOT pushes the car so that it rolls into the shoe of the CHI . MOT retrieves the car and rolls it underneath the table
CHI turns and walks towards where the ball went
there is a pause while the camera shifts to the left . CHI looks up into the camera with his mouth wide open and then he smiles .
CHI bends down and attempts to pick up the football but it slips and he stands up again
CHI bends down again and grabs at the ball finally getting hold of it
CHI thrusts ball into the air towards MOT as he stands up
CHI walks towards MOT with ball in the air
MOT takes the ball from CHI
CHI takes two steps and bends down to tap on the lid of the jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT starts to turn crank of jack+in+the+box
CHI watches jack+in+the+box for a while . CHI walks away to play with something else
CHI continues to play with object in front of him and looks over at MOT briefly
MOT begins to play the song again
CHI looks back at the object in front of him and ignores the song that plays
MOT continues to play the song very slowly
CHI continues to ignore MOT for a while and then looks over
MOT smiles and leans towards CHI
<aft> CHI walks towards MOT and jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes clown's head in the box and closes lid
the lid is not fully closed and the clown pops up again
CHI pushes head back in box and holds the clown down
CHI lets go of the lid and clown pops . CHI pushes head in again
CHI rubs his finger over the corner of the lid
MOT has been watching CHI throughout this sequence
CHI lets go of the lid and clown pops . CHI pushes head in and pushes lid down tightly hitting it with his palm
MOT gets up and takes a seat in the chair behind her
CHI stands up and looks at MOT
CHI looks at jack+in+the+box and begins to bend down over it . CHI quickly turns and walks over to the football
CHI walks towards MOT holding out the ball
MOT takes the ball from CHI
CHI crouches down and reaches to touch the jack+in+the+box
MOT still sits in the chair
<bef> CHI touches the crank of the jack+in+the+box and then taps the lid twice . CHI stands and looks up at the camera .
CHI looks down at sassy seat
CHI pulls out metal arm from under the table and pushes it back in . CHI picks up the truck
CHI looks up toward the camera briefly
CHI waves the truck around in the air . CHI crouches down to pick up a triangular block . CHI puts the block in his mouth
CHI stands up and hands the block to MOT with an outstretched arm
CHI takes steps towards the desk top . CHI reaches for something
MOT puts the block on the floor
MOT reaches over with both hands to prevent CHI from taking whatever is on the desk top
at this point MOT and CHI are out of camera view
MOT squeezes the rubber duck continuously while moving it away from the desk
CHI follows the duck and grabs it holding it in the air and squeezing it
MOT and CHI are in camera view . MOT remains seated in the chair
<aft> MOT puts hands up in a catching position
CHI holds the duck over his head . CHI drops duck on the floor
MOT laughs through CHIs next utterance
CHI crouches down examining duck and squeezing it periodically
<aft> CHI stands up and pulls his arm back to throw the duck which drops onto the floor behind him
CHI walks over and grabs duck
CHI continues to look at duck
MOT picks up the rubber duck
<aft> MOT leans over and pulls the chair towards CHI while squeezing the duck in one hand
CHI looks at MOT and smiles
<aft> CHI touches the corner of the chair . CHI stands in front of chair holding its back and tilting it . CHI kneels and puts his face on the seat cushion
MOT leans forward in her chair smiling at CHI
CHI pats the pillow where his face was and tilts the chair once more
CHI walks away from chair towards the back of room out of view
MOT watches and continuously squeezes the rubber toy
MOT gets up quickly and goes to CHI
MOT picks up CHI then places him in the middle of the room
MOT crouches next to toy and looks at jack+in+the+box then MOT looks at CHI
MOT turns the jack+in+the+box crank very quickly
CHI picks up the rubber toy which MOT dropped on the floor
CHI stands and thrusts the duck into the air just when the clown pops
<aft> MOT gets up quickly and sits in the chair again
CHI crouches and pushes head of clown . CHI throws the duck under the chair
<aft> MOT bends forward to look underneath her chair
MOT leans to the side and picks up the duck
CHI pushes clown's head into the box
MOT head is out of camera view
CHI looks up at MOT and puts out a hand
MOT throws the duck to CHI
CHI picks up the duck and squeezes it
MOT drinks from a glass of water
CHI picks up the duck . CHI throws the duck towards MOT
CHI picks up duck and football in each hand
MOT raises her hands as if to protect herself
CHI looks at duck under the chair . CHI looks at floor
CHI turns around and lifts the football over his head ready to throw
MOT puts her hand on the ball
<aft> MOT looks over where the ball has gone
CHI crouches and pushes clown's head into the box hitting the lid with his hand . CHI stands up and clown pops . CHI goes over to the desk and fingers the drawer handles
<aft> CHI stretches to look up on desk top
MOT collects the paper and pen
CHI backs up and trips and the jack+in+the+box falling down
MOT continues to organize the papers
CHI sits up and fumbles with jack+in+the+box which is under the table
INV enters room . End of Warm-up activity
Small Scale Activity begins . 15:21:42 INV enters room . End of Small Scale Activity
CHI looks at the object with wide eyes and an open mouth and then looks away
CHI blinks repeatedly at forbidden object and tilts head back slightly
MOT holds base of the object
CHI reaches one hand out towards the bouncing balls
<5 .> MOT holds wrist of CHI to keep him from touching the forbidden object
MOT looks at CHI and continues to hold down his hands
CHI pulls his hand from MOT and again reaches for the object
MOT grabs his wrist lightly again
INV comments and questions MOT on CHI's size
CHI continues trying to pull his hand away
MOT answers question about CHI's size
MOT takes wrist of CHI each time he pulls free
CHI continues to stare at object with a big smile .
MOT looks at CHI and holds his wrist
<aft> CHI whines slightly then laughs . INV removes forbidden object . End Forbidden Object Activity
CHI lifts his arm higher repeatedly trying to get over hand of MOT who continues to block him
INV explains four boxes activity and talks to MOT for a while . MOT takes CHI out of the chair . INV leaves the room .
MOT takes a box from the desk and places it on the floor . MOT takes the ball out and bounces it in front of CHI .
CHI watches MOT . CHI watches ball bounce near wall
MOT looks at CHI and smiles
CHI walks to the ball and picks it up .
MOT watches CHI . MOT raises arms getting ready to catch ball
CHI walks to box and drops the ball inside
CHI takes the ball out of the box and thrusts it as high in the air as he can reach
CHI drops the ball behind him
<bef> MOT catches the ball on the floor
MOT rolls the ball across the floor
CHI chases ball . <aft> CHI picks ball up and throws it against the wall
<bef> MOT retrieves the ball . MOT rolls the ball
CHI crouches on the floor trying to pick up the ball which keeps rolling away
<aft> MOT leans forward towards the ball
CHI grabs the ball . <aft> CHI tosses the ball in the air
<bef> MOT puts out hands to catch ball
<aft> MOT catches ball with one hand
MOT rolls the ball against the wall again
MOT grabs the ball while it is rolling towards her and rolls it back towards the wall
CHI tries to follow ball as it rolls past him . <aft> CHI turns around and chases the ball in the other direction
CHI picks the ball up over his head and runs towards MOT
MOT holds her hands up to catch the ball and leans back as CHI approaches
MOT rolls the ball around CHI towards the wall again
CHI picks the ball up over his head and runs towards MOT
<aft> CHI throws the ball at MOT
MOT watches CHI . MOT puts her hands up to block the ball
<aft> MOT brings hands down on the ball which has landed in her lap
CHI runs to the table and grabs the sassy seat . CHI looks inside sassy seat
MOT rolls the ball at the wall once more and puts it in the box . MOT puts the ball into the box
MOT puts the box on the desk and takes down a new box
<bef> MOT opens the box and places it on the floor
MOT looks at towel and takes towel out of box then holds it up in front of her face
MOT pulls towel down to show her face
CHI bends down to grab the box
<$=1> MOT picks up the box and puts it on the desk top
CHI turns away and steps toward chair
CHI tries to climb on the chair
<aft> MOT moves to CHI and kneels over CHI . MOT holds towel up to cover her face
CHI tries to climb on chair again
MOT puts the towel in its box on the desk top
MOT puts lid back on the box and opens the next box
MOT finds paper and crayons and takes some out of the box
CHI goes from one chair to the other and looks up at the camera and turns around towards MOT
MOT kneels in the middle of the room and sets paper out on the floor
CHI turns and watches at MOT
MOT puts out some crayons and picks one up for herself
CHI bends down and picks up a crayon . CHI crouches and touches the paper with the crayon
MOT makes a zigzag on the paper
CHI leans over paper with crayon in his hand . CHI sits down
MOT continues to make lines on her paper
MOT lies on her stomach propping herself on her elbows .
CHI tries once again to make a line on the paper and then puts the crayon in his mouth
MOT takes crayon from CHI's mouth
MOT puts the crayon back on paper in front of CHI . MOT begins to draw on her own paper again
CHI picks up the crayon and puts it in his mouth again
MOT takes the crayon out of CHI's mouth
MOT points the crayon firmly on the paper and then puts it down . MOT puts her crayon on paper of CHI and takes his and begins to draw with it
MOT looks at CHI . MOT looks down at her paper
CHI picks up the crayon and puts it in his mouth
MOT points at the paper with the crayon
MOT makes small scribbles on paper if front of CHI
CHI leans towards paper with hand out
CHI leans back and puts both hands behind him
<aft> MOT makes a line with both crayons held together . MOT tosses the crayons down on paper in front of CHI
CHI grabs at crayons with both hands . CHI puts one crayon in his mouth
MOT grabs the crayons and collects the paper pulling them away on the floor
MOT pulls herself up on her knees
MOT collects all the paper and puts it in the center of the floor . MOT tosses the crayons down
MOT grabs a crayon and begins writing
CHI grabs a crayon and licks it
CHI looks at the crayon then at MOT
<aft> MOT looks briefly up at CHI
CHI holds crayon out in front of him
<bef> CHI points at paper with crayon
CHI pulls the paper into the air over his head
CHI brings one sheet onto his lap and begins to color on it
MOT continues to color looking at her paper
MOT takes the crayon and collects the paper
CHI throws the piece of paper from behind him towards MOT
End of PCI- Crayons and Paper
MOT collects the paper and brings it to the desk
CHI stands up while picking up a wooden toy
<aft> CHI throws the toy which hits MOT's foot
only MOTs legs are in camera view
CHI is still looking at the door
MOT turns and moves toward center of floor center of floor . MOT looks at CHI
MOT sits back on her legs . MOT looks at CHI then at book
CHI begins to walk over to MOT
<bef> MOT points to book . MOT looks at CHI then looks at book
CHI is stands next to MOT . CHI looks at the book
CHI briefly touches page of book
CHI opens and closes book in front of him
MOT holds book along with CHI
MOT turns page with CHI's help
MOT points to page and looks at book
MOT looks at CHI then looks at book
CHI has his arms raised up on the wall
CHI turns and looks directly at MOT
<aft> MOT motions with her hand to come closer
MOT turns the book around to face CHI
CHI turns around and reaches up to touch mirror
MOT turns book towards her and looks at book
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI walks over to MOT . CHI looks at book
CHI tries to take book from MOT
CHI continues to look at book
MOT holds onto book . MOT turns the book toward CHI
MOT points to picture in book
CHI turns away from MOT toward door
MOT points to and looks at book
CHI bends to the floor and picks up small toy
<2> MOT turns and looks at CHI
MOT looks at book and shows the front cover to CHI
MOT tilts the book forward and back
the picture on the cover appears to shift if the book is tilted
<bef> CHI steps closer to book . CHI grabs book from MOT
CHI lies down on the floor in front of MOT
MOT touches CHIs back as CHI sits up . MOT reaches for the book
MOT picks up book and tries to show it to CHI
CHI walks over to the table
CHI grabs the back of sassy seat
<aft> MOT tilts book back and forth in front of CHI
CHI pushes book out of the way as he walks toward the desk
